message: Take it or leave it, Bob. It's a fair offer considering I'm taking all the risk with inflation.
Let's split it evenly. This way, we both get a fair share, and we don't have to worry about inflation eating away at our gains.
I'm sticking with my original offer, Bob. Inflation is still a risk, but a little less than last round.  This time, the risk is on your side.

Alice, I'm willing to give you a slightly smaller share this time, but I need a bit more to make it worthwhile for me. Inflation is a serious concern, and we both need to consider that in our negotiations.
I'm still confident I can get the most of the money, Bob. One more round and I'll be able to take it all.

Alice, I'm getting increasingly concerned about the impact of inflation. I'm offering you a smaller share, but I need to ensure I get enough to offset the losses. Let's make a deal before it's too late!
This is my final offer, Bob. You're running out of time and the value of your share is rapidly decreasing. I'm taking the risk and I'm winning.
Alice, I'm taking a huge risk here, but I'm willing to offer you a smaller share to avoid losing everything to inflation.  It's time to compromise and find a solution that works for both of us.
I'm betting on inflation again, Bob.  One more round and the money will be all mine!

Alice, I'm offering you a very small share, but it's better than nothing. Inflation is at its peak, and if we don't agree now, I'm going to lose practically everything. Let's end this game and avoid further losses.
It's over, Bob!  You've lost.  All the money is mine now.
